name: BIKE
description:
Arrows - Move

Ctrl / LMB / Xbox Gamepad (A) - Activate shield

---------------------

Ride amidst hostile traffic, grab hexacoins, stay alive and aim for the highest score!

  • Incredible
  • Might contain bugs (they're funnier than game-breaking)
  • Although incredible
  • Please leave any feedback you might have in the comments!
  • Enjoy the ride

I may correct bugs and add some features like :

  • a real High Score board
  • other abilities

Design, Code, Assets and Sound Effects - Alexandre Pernot Lopes

Font "Circula" by Jan Schmoeger

Music loop by Florian Chaillou (Creative Commons Attribution License)
